title: Alchemist Yuki’s Capture - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shounen
tags: Alchemy   Androgynous Characters   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Artificial Intelligence   Brother Complex   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Doting Older Siblings   Gamers   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   MMORPG   Mysterious Family Background   Popular Love Interests   Shota   Siblings   Underestimated Protagonist   Virtual Reality   Younger Sisters
author: 白兎 龍
description:
Another World Online is the world's first VR game.

The protagonist, who was invited by a friend to play the game, ended up taking alchemy and summoning, two unfortunate skills.

However, that's that, and he is going his own way, conquering the world with his exceptional luck and innate talent!

This is the record of the adventures of the man who will one day be known as the Demon King.>
